scripts.update: bun upgrade && bun update --latest && bun install
scripts.rebuild: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/frontend/node_modules && rm -rf packages/dev/node_modules && rm -rf packages/frontend/dist && rm -rf packages/frontend/.astro && bun run update
scripts.reset: bun run rebuild && bun run devtools && bun run build
scripts.devtools: bun run submodule && bun --filter dev main && bun run smol-format
scripts.check: bun --filter frontend check && bun --filter dev check && bun --filter gsheets2img check
scripts.compress-build: bun run build && bun run compress
scripts.deploy: bun run compress-build && bunx wrangler deploy
